summary: A yield-statement causes execution to temporarily exit an invocation.
details: A function that contains a yield-statement is a generator-function.
static-checks: The type of the value must be either a primitive-type or a reference-type.
The type of the value must be assignable to the return-type of the enclosing function.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A    (F::println (My::next));%0A}%0A%0Adefun next() : String%0A{%0A    marker StartOfYear;%0A%0A    yield %22January%22;%0A    yield %22February%22;%0A    yield %22March%22;%0A    yield %22April%22;%0A    yield %22May%22;%0A    yield %22June%22;%0A    yield %22July%22;%0A    yield %22August%22;%0A    yield %22September%22;%0A    yield %22October%22;%0A    yield %22November%22;%0A    yield %22December%22;%0A%0A    goto StartOfYear;%0A}
